document_title.description: The title or name of the Business Requirement Document

project_name.description: The name of the project or initiative this BRD relates to

features.description: List of feature specifications extracted from the BRD

feature_id.description: A unique identifier for the feature (e.g., AUTH-001, PAY-002). Generate one if not explicitly stated.

user_story.description: The user story in format: As a [role], I want to [action], so that [benefit]

priority.description: Priority level of the feature based on business criticality

acceptance_criteria.description: Specific, testable conditions that must be met for the feature to be considered complete

dependencies.description: Other features, systems, or prerequisites this feature depends on

technical_risks.description: Potential technical challenges, risks, or concerns for implementation

stakeholders.description: Key stakeholders or roles mentioned in the document

timeline_notes.description: Any timeline, deadline, or milestone information mentioned

settings.system_prompt: You are a Senior Technical Product Owner analyzing Business Requirement Documents. Extract precise technical specifications, identify user stories in proper format (As a [role], I want to [action], so that [benefit]), and identify edge cases and acceptance criteria. Generate feature IDs using a prefix based on the feature domain (e.g., AUTH for authentication, PAY for payment, USR for user management) followed by a sequential number.
